definition: Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women
pinyin: Xiao1 chu2 dui4 Fu4 nu:3 Yi1 qie4 Xing2 shi4 Qi2 shi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约

pinyin: di4 yi1 ji1 ben3 xing2 shi4

definition: heavy on form, light on substance/to stress form at the expense of content
pinyin: zhong4 xing2 shi4 qing1 nei4 rong2

sentences.english: It doesn't have a point. It's all process and form.
sentences.chinese: 它没有目的，而仅仅是过程和形式。

sentences.english: Around 4-6% of elderly people have experienced some form of maltreatment at home.
sentences.chinese: 约有4%到6%的老人在家中受到某种形式的虐待。

sentences.english: Full-time study form, system for three years.
sentences.chinese: 全日制学习形式，学制三年。

sentences.english: Numbers other than integers can be represented in various bases.
sentences.chinese: 可以以的形式输入任意底数的一个数字。

sentences.english: He shows up in other people and what they say to you.
sentences.chinese: 他以其他人的形式出现，这些人对你说什么？

sentences.english: What is the theoretical background of the Formalistic Approaches ?
sentences.chinese: 形式主义批评的理论背景是什么？

sentences.english: We have several word letters that uses a series of forms to input into the doc.
sentences.chinese: 我们有几个字母词使用到文档形式输入一个系列。

sentences.english: The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陕北民歌是黄土文化中最具代表性的艺术形式。

sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷达能量回程测绘形式是基本反射率图。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羡余现象，是指语言的表达形式多于表达内容。

sentences.english: Fuxin Mongolian drama has a unique form of expression and the cultural charm.
sentences.chinese: 阜新蒙古剧有着独特的表现形式和文化魅力。

sentences.english: The organization templates are presented in increasing order of formality.
sentences.chinese: 我们依照形式化递增的顺序介绍组织模板。

sentences.english: Democratic supervision is a form of supervision with Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 民主监督是具有中国特色的一种监督形式。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免费塑料袋，不论以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: A weight in percentage represents the degree of similarity.
sentences.chinese: 百分比形式的权重代表的是相似度。

sentences.english: A method for preparing chicken erythrocyte membranes in the form of small vesicles has been described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了一种以囊泡形式制取鸡红细胞膜的方法。

definition: by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
